title: Geothermal: A Green Energy Solution
content:
Wilder Nicholson, a Bowdoin college student, spent his school break filming this insightful video about geothermal and wonders if its really a green energy solution. Geothermal is said to be one of the best carbon footprint reducing sources of energy, an untapped virtual goldmine.  But as the citizens and leaders of Iceland have learned through experience, its not perfect and has to be managed properly or else can become a big negative. 
 
 
Geothermal: A Green Energy Solution? from Wilder Nicholson on Vimeo .
